results.title: Association between long-term prescription of metformin and the progression of heart failure with preserved ejection fraction in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Long-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure was associated with protective effects in terms of the incidence of new-onset symptomatic HFpEF, @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@LV diastolic dysfunction and hypertrophy@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, which might be beneficial for the delay of HFpEF progression.

citations.NLM: Gu J, Yin ZF, Zhang JF, Wang CQ. Association between long-term prescription of metformin and the progression of heart failure with preserved ejection fraction in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension. Int J Cardiol. 2020 May 1;306():140-145. PMID: 31711850
citations.BibTeX: @article{31711850, title={Association between long-term prescription of metformin and the progression of heart failure with preserved ejection fraction in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension.}, author={Gu J and Yin ZF and Zhang JF and Wang CQ}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={306}, pages={140-145}}

results.title: Metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension-induced right ventricular dysfunction in an age- and sex-specific manner independent of cardiac AMPK.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: The anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug and AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK) activator @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects against @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@left ventricular dysfunction@@@, suggesting cardioprotective properties may translate to the RV.

citations.NLM: McNair BD, Polson SM, Shorthill SK, Yusifov A, Walker LA, Weiser-Evans MCM, Kovacs EJ, Bruns DR. Metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension-induced right ventricular dysfunction in an age- and sex-specific manner independent of cardiac AMPK. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2023 Jun 30;():. PMID: 37389952

results.title: The Effect of Metformin on Diastolic Function in Patients Presenting with ST-Elevation Myocardial Infarction
results.text_hl: After 4 months 22 (19%) of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and 18 (15%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with placebo (P = 0.47) had @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@diastolic dysfunction@@@.
